title: Cabinet Ministers decide NOT to obtain salaries for this year
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lankan Cabinet of Ministers have decided NOT to draw salaries for this year.
Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe had submitted a cabinet proposal for the ministers NOT to draw their salaries for this year, and to serve the country.
Cabinet Spokesperson Minister Bandula Gunawardena said the decision was made at the meeting of Cabinet of Ministers on Monday (6).
